aic2022.user

Class GameConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • aic2022.user.GameConstants

  • public class GameConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing all constants used in the game. Some of the unit parameters are condensed into arrays v such that v[t.ordinal()] gives the parameter of UnitType t. These parameters don't take into account possible technology upgrades (these are in separate constants).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BARBARIAN_PASSIVE_ATTACK
      Barbarian attack increase for every missing health threshold.
      static int BARBARIAN_PASSIVE_HEALTH_THRESHOLD
      Missing health threshold for barbarians' first passive.
      static float BARBARIAN_PASSIVE_MULTIPLIER
      Barbarian damage multipliers because of its passive at level 4.
      static int[] CHEST_CHANCE_1_ARTIFACT
      Chance that there is at least one artifact in a chest of a given type (in percentage, sorted by ordinal).

      Chance that there are at least two artifacts in a chest of a given type (in percentage, sorted by ordinal).

      Chance that there are three artifacts in a chest of a given type (in percentage, sorted by ordinal).

      Reputation obtained by opening a chest of a given type (sorted by ordinal).

      Attack cooldown scaling inside a cleric's passive.

      Range of the cleric's second passive.

      Turns that units take since their construction until they can move and attack.

      Cooldowns decreased because of the cleric's second ability.

      Number of rounds before dungeons reset.

      Damage multiplier by the enrage ability of barbarians.

      Energy consumed whenever a unit is penalized.

      Damage recovered by explorers when they have no enemies in vision range.

      Damage scaling because of forests.

      Damage scaling because of forests for rangers level 4.

      • UNIT_STATS

        public static final float[][] UNIT_STATS

        public GameConstants()

    • Method Detail

      • shrineReputation

        public static int shrineReputation(int distance)
        Method that returns the reputation that a town provides as a function of the distance to the base. The formula is given by distance/40. It costs 1 energy.
        Parameters:
        distance - Distance to base.
        Returns:
        the reputation that a town provides as a function of the distance to the base.
